repository.name: Tumppi066 Plugin Repo
repository.description:
The official plugins for ETS2LA from Tumppi066.
NOTE: Most of these plugins are deprecated and won't be updated.

plugins.name: External API
plugins.description: Creates an external API for ETS2LA. This is useful for external applications to interface with the app.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: HUD
plugins.description: A deprecated HUD plugin. It overlaid information on top of the game, in the place where the screen capture was.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: Lane Departure Warning
plugins.description: Warns the user if the truck is about to leave the lane. Even if the steering is disabled.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: LSTR Draw Lanes
plugins.description: Draws the LSTR lanes on the preview. Requires the LSTR lane detection plugin to be enabled.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: LSTR Lane Detection
plugins.description: Detects and tracks lanes on the road with the LSTR model.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: Map
plugins.description: Reads the game map directly, and uses that to drive the truck. Not yet complete, do not use.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: Settings Json Viewer
plugins.description: A plugin that allows you to view the settings JSON file.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: Switch Lane Detection Device
plugins.description: Will reinstall onnx to either use GPU or CPU on the next startup.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: UFLD Draw Lanes
plugins.description: Will draw the lanes on the preview. Requires the UFLD lane detection plugin to be enabled.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: UFLD Installer
plugins.description: Will automatically download and install the UFLD lane detection model.
plugins.author: Tumppi066

plugins.name: UFLD Lane Detection
plugins.description: Will detect and track lanes on the road with the UFLD model.
plugins.author: Tumppi066
